title: Local systems which do not come from abelian varieties
authors: Paul Brommer-Wierig and Yeuk Hay Joshua Lam
abstract:
For each punctured curve over a finite field, we construct local systems
which do not come from a family of abelian varieties. We do so by proving a
criterion which must be satisfied by local systems which do come from abelian
varieties, inspired by an analogous Hodge theoretic criterion in characteristic
zero. Our tools include $F$-isocrystals and some $p$-adic Hodge theory.
